title: After updated the May 2020 security patch, my microphone isn't working anymore
content:
After updated the May2020 security patch, the microphone on my Pixel 4 XL isn't working anymore. I have to use speaker to talk. Google recorder app doesn't record anything, keyboard dictation doesn't work either 

However, when I record a video from camera app, sound was able to record, so it's clearly not a hardware issue.

Please fix this asap. This is a basic feature of a phone.

Thanks
